name: My Fearless Friend
description:
You play as a young boy who is scared of everything. He gets visited by a young ghost that is lost. Together they agree to help each other and the ghost help the boy overcome his fears while the boy helps the ghost to find his way home.

A old and rare DOS game from 1995. Made by Makh-Shevet Ltd. They where an Israeli PC games developer, publisher, localizer and distributor during the 90s. The company filed for bankruptcy in 1997.
Very little information could be found about the game prior to me uploading the game to the archive.org.
